snippet: Funding Circle is now available in the United Kingdom and the United States, and Samir Desai, the start-up’s chief executive, said the company would use the new fundraising to expand its operations on both sides of the Atlantic.
abstract: Funding Circle is now available in the United Kingdom and the United States, and Samir Desai, the start-up’s chief executive, said the company would use the new fundraising to expand its operations on both sides of the Atlantic.
